marklogic.body: I occasionally nap during my lunch (usually in my car, but this is best in the spring/fall when the weather is perfect--otherwise it's Too hot or too Cold). I can eat lunch in 10-15 minutes & I'm small enough to just lean my seat back & put up my feet (the Joys of being petite). I just took a 15-minute nap today, in fact. I think 20-30 minutes would be more ideal though. I've also gone for short runs this past winter during my lunch (about 2 miles) and that I think leaves me more invigorated and energized to finish the afternoon well.
